verses.text:
I GIVER and guardian of our sleep,
To praise thy name we wake ;
Still, Lord, thy watchful servants keep,
For thine own mercy's sake.

The blessing of another day
We thankfully receive ;
Oh ! may we only thee obey,
And to thy glory live.

Full rays of hope, we wait the hour
Which shall be our faithful hour ;
When all we are shall own thy power,
And call our Jesus King.
